Why Choose Majesty Hosting?​


99.9% Network Uptime - We keep your website up and running!​

Royal Support - Our Royal Support Staff are here 9am to 10pm GMT to help with all your needs!​

DDoS Protection - We offer Comprehensive DDoS Protection.​

Trusted Host - Trust us to host your website!​



Majesty Hosting Features​

These features come standard in all of our hosting plans.

cPanel Control Panel​

Our cPanel control panel gives you admin access to all of your hosting products easily.

Real-live support avaliable to assist you 9am to 10pm! Other times please send us a support ticket.

When you need help with your services, Majesty Hosting is here for you!.

Frequently Asked Questions​


What's the difference between Shared & Reseller Hosting?​

Shared Hosting is a regular low-cost web hosting solution suitable for the vast majority of personal and small business web sites, and is provided under our Duke, Prince and King plans.
For those customers with demanding or high traffic sites, or for those looking to host a web site with faster speeds, Reseller Hosting is recommended - these are the plans named Duchess, Princess and Queen.
We'd recommend our Reseller hosting plans for e-commerce stores, high traffic sites, or for those customers who want to leverage our server side caching technology so that their site loads as fast as possible.

Is your support 24x7?​

Yes and No. We will provide live support from 9am to 10pm approx. daily, the rest of the time we will have an extensive Knowledgebase available. You can also submit a support ticket.

Is your hosting business UK based?​

Yes! Our business is based in Northumberland - just north of Newcastle Upon Tyne. Our main servers are based in the USA, but we are open to deploying servers anywhere in the world. You can also enable a free CloudFlare CDN from your control panel which will serve up static content such as images from over 100 global locations serving every continent, speeding up service to your visitors wherever they are.

Do you offer a money-back guarantee?​

Yes, we provide a no quibble 14-day money back guarantee on any hosting fees. If you registered or transferred a domain name, these fees are non-refundable but you would be able to use your domain with any other provider. If you received a free domain with your plan, we will refund all your fees less our standard fee to register the domain that you received for free. VPS and other services are exempt from our MBG

Can I get root access?​

No, root access is not available on any of our shared hosting plans. If you require root access with your hosting, we would recommend you purchase a VPS or dedicated server.

About Us​

Majesty Hosting has been providing quality web hosting services since 1999 under the name Niceday Hosting.
In 2018 we closed down our hosting business, but for the last 12 months we have had people asking if were still hosting, so in 2021 we decided to restart offering hosting under a new name (a fresh start, so a fresh name).
For over 18 years we offered and still will offer quality hosting, one of our main goals was and still is to provide top-notch web hosting services. How? By doing it with the best customer experience and reasonable pricing rates.
We focus mainly on uptime and client satisfaction. A unique aspect of Majesty Hosting can be seen in the high level of support that is guaranteed with all plans we offer to clients worldwide.
Our technical support team differ Majesty Hosting from all other hosting companies and makes us the preferred choice for various types of individuals and businesses worldwide.
